com.adobe.cq.social.scf

Interface ClientUtilities


  • public interface ClientUtilities
    Provides helper methods that aid in performing some request specific functions like XSS, URL generations, etc.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • externalLink

        java.lang.String externalLink(java.lang.String path)
        Computes the externalized URL to the resource at the given path.
        Parameters:
        path - path to the resource
        Returns:
        an externalized url to the resource

      • externalLink

        java.lang.String externalLink(java.lang.String path,
                              java.lang.Boolean needExtension)
        Computes the externalized URL to the resource at the given path.
        Parameters:
        path - path to resource
        needExtension - boolean to indicate whether the .social.json extension needs to be appended to the URL
        Returns:
        an externalized url to the resource with or without .social.json suffix.

      • getRequestExtension

        java.lang.String getRequestExtension()
        Get the current extension of the request. Useful when building URLS based on the requested content type. If the constructor that takes in a ResourceResolver was used then this information is not available and null is returned.
        Returns:
        the extension without a leading dot

      • filterHTML

        java.lang.String filterHTML(java.lang.String valueToBeFiltered)
        Calls XSSAPI filterHTML on the provided String. If no reference to XSSAPI is available the String is returned as is.
        Parameters:
        valueToBeFiltered - The String to be filtered.
        Returns:
        The filtered String.

      • getSocialComponentFactoryManager

        SocialComponentFactoryManager getSocialComponentFactoryManager()
        Get the SocialComponentFactoryManager service.
        Returns:
        the SocialComponentFactoryManager service.

      • getSocialUtils

        SocialUtils getSocialUtils()
        Gets the SocialUtils service.
        Returns:
        a SocialUtils implementation

      • getAuthorizedUserId

        java.lang.String getAuthorizedUserId()
        Gets the authorized user ID. If the constructor that takes a ResourceResolver was used then this information is not available and null will be returned.
        Returns:
        The authorized user ID, or null.

      • userIsAnonymous

        boolean userIsAnonymous()
        Helper method to check whether the user is anonymous (not logged in) or not. If the constructor that takes a ResourceResolver was used then this will always return true.
        Returns:
        true if the authorized userID is null or anonymous

      • getRequest

        SlingHttpServletRequest getRequest()
        Get the original request.
        Returns:
        the SlingHttpServletRequest request

      • getSocialProfilePath

        java.lang.String getSocialProfilePath()
        Helper method to get the configured social profile path for the page on which the resource is contained. If the constructor that takes a ResourceResolver is used this information is not available and null will be returned.
        Returns:
        The configured social profile (public) path if one exists, or null.

      • getContainingPage

        Page getContainingPage(java.lang.String path)
        Returns the page that contains the resource at the given path if path is absolute. If path is relative, the request resources path is pre-pended to the path in order to construct an absolute path. If the constructor that takes a ResourceResolver was used then this will always return null. request path to construct an absolute path.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the resource for which the containing page is to be found
        Returns:
        the page that contains the resource if one is found

      • getPage

        Page getPage(java.lang.String pathToPage)
        Returns the Page from the specified path.
        Parameters:
        pathToPage - path to a page
        Returns:
        Page object from the page path, or null.

             ResourceResolver resolver)

        Parameters:

        resolver - The resolver to use.
        Returns:
        A User representing the user id.

      • getAttachmentsFromRequest

        @Nonnull
java.util.List<FileDataSource> getAttachmentsFromRequest(long attachmentSizeLimit,
                                                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> whiteList,
                                                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> blackList)
        Utility to filter the attachments in the current request against the specified white list, black list, and size.
        Parameters:
        attachmentSizeLimit - Size limit for attachments.
        whiteList - List of allowed file types.
        blackList - File types that are not allowed.
        Returns:
        List of filtered attachments.

      • getAttachmentsFromRequest

        @Nonnull
java.util.List<FileDataSource> getAttachmentsFromRequest(RequestParameter[] fileRequestParameters,
                                                                  long attachmentSizeLimit,
                                                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> whitelist,
                                                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> blacklist)
        Utility to check attached files against the specified white list and black list.
        Parameters:
        fileRequestParameters - Request parameters of the type file.
        attachmentSizeLimit - Size limit for attachments.
        whitelist - List of allowed file types.
        blacklist - File types that are not allowed.
        Returns:
        List of filtered attachments.

      • getAttachmentsFromRequest

        @Nonnull
java.util.List<FileDataSource> getAttachmentsFromRequest(RequestParameter[] fileRequestParameters,
                                                                  FileUploadSizeLimit fileUploadSizeLimit,
                                                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> whitelist,
                                                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> blackList)
        Utility to check attached files against the specified white list and black list.
        Parameters:
        fileRequestParameters - Request parameters of the type file.
        fileUploadSizeLimit - FileUploadSizeLimit of the file.
        whitelist - List of allowed file types.
        blackList - File types that are not allowed.
        Returns:
        List of filtered attachments.

      • getAttachmentsFromDataSources

        @Nonnull
java.lang.Iterable<FileDataSource> getAttachmentsFromDataSources(java.lang.Iterable<FileDataSource> attachmentList,
                                                                          FileUploadSizeLimit fileUploadSizeLimit,
                                                                          java.util.Set<java.lang.String> whitelist,
                                                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> blacklist)
        Utility to check attached files against the specified white list and black list.
        Parameters:
        attachmentList - Unfiltered list of attachments.
        fileUploadSizeLimit - FileUploadSizeLimit of the file.
        whitelist - List of allowed file types.
        blacklist - File types that are not allowed.
        Returns:
        List of filtered FileDataSource

      • getAttachmentFromDataSource

        @CheckForNull
FileDataSource getAttachmentFromDataSource(FileDataSource attachmentDataSource,
                                                         FileUploadSizeLimit fileUploadSizeLimit,
                                                         java.util.Set<java.lang.String> whitelist,
                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> blacklist)
        Utility to check a file against the specified white list, black list, and size restraints.
        Parameters:
        attachmentDataSource - FileDataSource of the attachment.
        fileUploadSizeLimit - FileUploadSizeLimit of the file.
        whitelist - Set of allowed file types.
        blacklist - File types that are not allowed.
        Returns:
        FileDataSource for the file. Or null if the file is not allowed.

      • getDesignProperties

        ValueMap getDesignProperties(Resource componentResource,
                             java.lang.String restrictToType)
        This Will attempt to get the design based on the component resource. If the component resource is a non existing resource, it will attempt to get the design from there. If the NER is not in the content tree it will create a path based on the last include location + the last token in the NER's path.
        Parameters:
        componentResource - what component resource to try and get the design properties from
        restrictToType - only allow this method to return if the requested type hint isA certain type
        Returns:
        a value map of the component's design properties

      • getIncludedResource

        Resource getIncludedResource()
        Gets the included component when Sling performed the include on the server.
        Returns:
        the resource that was included to produce this component.

      • getGroup

        SocialGroup getGroup(java.lang.String id,
                     ResourceResolver resolver,
                     java.lang.String resourceType)
        Get the SocialGroup for the specified user id with the specified resource type.
        Parameters:
        id - String
        resolver - ResourceResolver
        resourceType - String
        Returns:
        SocialGroup

      • getAuthorizedUserProfileProperties

        UserProperties getAuthorizedUserProfileProperties()
                                           throws RepositoryException
        Get the UserProperties for the authenticated user.
        Returns:
        UserProperties
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if a repository problem is encountered.

      • getUserProperties

        UserProperties getUserProperties(java.lang.String authorizableId,
                                 java.lang.String relPath)
                          throws RepositoryException
        Get the UserProperties for the specified user
        Parameters:
        authorizableId - the user whose properties to get.
        relPath - the relative path within the user to find the properties, usually 'profile' or 'preferences'.
        Returns:
        UserProperties of the specified user from the specified path
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if a repository problem is encountered.

      • getCommonStorePath

        java.lang.String getCommonStorePath(Resource resource)
        This method maps the given resource to its equivalent resource path based on applicable global shared storage cloud config settings. This supports language specific pages hosting Communities components which all store their content in a language neutral location in the SRP.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource to transpose.
        Returns:
        string representing the global shared storage resource path.
